titles.title: To limit United States assistance to the Palestinian Authority if the Palestinian Authority unilaterally declares a Palestinian state.
To limit United States assistance to the Palestinian Authority if the Palestinian Authority unilaterally declares a Palestinian state.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East and South Asia .

committee.name: House Foreign Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Middle East, North Africa, and Central Asia

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: Prohibits assistance to the Palestinian Authority (PA) from being obligated or expended if the President certifies to Congress that the PA has unilaterally declared a Palestinian state.
